sys_openapi_operation.name: Returns all templates.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Returns all templates.","fOperationId":"getAll","fDescription":"This API returns the list of available templates/asset types with their IDs. You will need the ID when creating a new asset for that type or when filtering the list of assets on asset type.","fPath":"/assetmgmt/templates","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"On success.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson4249641826","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/TemplateListResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"When user doesn\u0027t have any kind of permission for the module.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"archived","fDescription":"Whether to show archived templates.
